briefdescription.para: YAP supports several clause optimisation mechanisms, that are designed to improve execution of arithmetic and term construction built-ins.

detaileddescription.para: In other words, during the compilation process a clause is rewritten twice:

listitem.para: first, perform user-defined goal_expansion as described in the predicates goal_expansion/1 and goal_expansion/2

Perform expansion of some built-ins like:
pruning operators, like ->/2 and F>/2
arithmetic, including early evaluation of constant expressions
specialise versions for some built-ins, if we are aware of the run-time execution mode

detaileddescription.para: The user has some control over this process, through some built-ins and through execution flsgs
